Translations.Text: ellezine ateynahumu-lkitabe min kablihi hum bihi yu'minun
veiza yutla `aleyhim kalu amenna bihi innehu-lhakku mir rabbina inna kunna min kablihi muslimin
ulaike yu'tevne ecrahum merrateyni bima saberu veyedraune bilhaseneti-sseyyiete vemimma razaknahum yunfikun
veiza semi`u-llagve a`radu `anhu vekalu lena a`maluna velekum a`malukum. selamun `aleykum. la nebtegi-lcahilin
inneke la tehdi men ahbebte velakinne-llahe yehdi mey yesa'. vehuve a`lemu bilmuhtedin
vekalu in nettebi`i-lhuda me`ake nutehattef min ardina. evelem numekkil lehum haramen aminey yucba ileyhi semeratu kulli sey'ir rizkam mil ledunna velakinne ekserahum la ya`lemun
vekem ehlekna min karyetim betirat me`iseteha. fetilke mesakinuhum lem tuskem mim ba`dihim illa kalila. vekunna nahnu-lvarisin
vema kane rabbuke muhlike-lkura hatta yeb`ase fi ummiha rasuley yetlu `aleyhim ayatina. vema kunna muhliki-lkura illa veehluha zalimun
